name: Drunken Samurai
description:
Drunken samurai and sake, what could be better? You play as a samurai who needs a drink. Find it on the map or take it from opponents by killing them. Perhaps it is not so easy when in the eyes of a samurai everything sways, and the enemies are not so simple.

Drunken Samurai is a 2D platformer where as a samurai you have to get some booze to keep the fun going. The drink-lover will stop at nothing! Kill opponents level by level and get your sake.

Features of the game:
- Nice graphics
- Dynamic music
- Variety of levels
- Complexity
